item.description:
A full day of Kundalini Yoga, Meditation, Chanting, shopping, vegetarian cuisine, healings,seeing old friends and making new ones. Featured Musical artist Jai Jagdeesh Kaur and featured Yoga teachers, Harbhjan Kaur, Mahan Rishi Singh and Guruatma Singh and Kaye Khalsa. Also featuring EkongKar Singh as are MC and Dharam Singh the Gong Yogi! It will be a day of JOY, Laughter, and Healing very powerful!

To register for this amazing event go to www.YogaAtTheAshram.org
item.name: Kundalini Yoga Festival
